name: Checkerboard Strategic Web Development
tagline: FOCUS ON WHAT YOU LOVE. WE’LL HANDLE THE REST.
description:
Checkerboard Strategic Web Development is a trusted partner for achieving customized, online marketing solutions. The primary focus is on building dynamic web sites that get results. Throughout the process, we help you devise an online marketing plan with strategies and tactics to help your team execute the plan. 
You’ll have all the training and follow-up you’ll ever need to kick-start and manage your marketing efforts.
